response.overview: Rich in detail and emotional depth, "The Incredible Journey of Creation" documentary series authentically presents the process of turning dreams into reality at Universal Beijing Resort.  Designers and builders from around the world worked across borders and combined cutting-edge technology and art to bring the world of blockbusters to life. Through nine episodes, the documentary showcases the impressive creation process of the seven themed lands within the Universal Beijing Resort and goes behind the scenes of a world-class theme park. It also offers a glimpse into the delightful stories of how global cuisine was brought to the resort, as well as Universal Beijing Resort's commitment to environmental sustainability. The nine episodes vividly embody Universal Beijing Resort's relentless focus on quality and guest experience.
response.title: The Incredible Journey of Creation
